topic.title: Reader
topic.section:
Readers include both subscribers for presses for which access is subscription-based, and readers who choose to register for open access presses (whether immediately open access or open after a period of time after initial publication of press content). Registered Readers receive a notification email with the publication of each monograph, which includes the Table of Contents. On registering themselves with the press, Authors are given the option of enrolling as Readers as well.

More information on Registering for a press can be found {help_topic key="user.registerAndProfile" text="here"}.
